review: **** ****** ** *** *********My mother consulted him for arthritis twice.when asked for any doubts he replies very rudely and speaks very degradingly.He might be well experienced and knowledgeable. But highly rude and asks patient to leave the room if asked any doubts.The second time my mother consulted he got into personal matters and said how family members are tolerating this patient.He needs counselling for handling patients nicely.My mother's BP raised that day and she was ill the whole day as he got into personal matters.

While he may be a good doctor, his way of handling patients leaves a lot to be desired. Dr.Kaushik speaks in a very condescending tone and doesn't answer any questions or concerns that the patients might have. Also the medicines he prescribes are only available in his clinic where he operates, making it very difficult for us to procure them while traveling.
